Name: Band of Strength
Description: Increases Melee Damage by 5% for 10 seconds after a Charge Melee Attack (100% Chance). Stacks up to 4 times.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom

Name: Blood Font
Description: Regenerates 0.405 Health per second. (Affected by Triage Trait).
Location: Can be found in Corsus

Name: Braided Thorns
Description: Increases Crit Chance by 15% for 10 seconds after slaying an enemy.
Location: Dropped by Root Worshiper found on Earth - Marrow Pass

Name: Celerity Stone
Description: Increases Consumable Use Speed by 40%.
Location: Can be found dropped at a random location at Yaesha

Name: Devouring Loop
Description: Critical Hits have a 6% chance to deal 300% bonus damage.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Corsus

Name: Ezlan's Band
Description: Increases Max Health by 25.
Location:
Can be found dropped inside a building at The Iron Rift at Rhom

Can be found dropped at The Burrows at The Labyrinth

Name: Gravity Stone
Description: Increases damage by 20% when there are at least 2 enemies within 10 meters of the wearer
Location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom

Name: Heartseeker
Description: Provides 100% Crit Chance against non-aggressive enemies and increases Crit Damage by 15%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Hunter's Band
Description: Increases Weak Spot damage by 30% when hitting a target's weak spot from farther than 15 meters.
Location: Found at a random location at Yaesha

Name: Hunter's Halo
Description: Increase the effective Range of all firearms by 4m
Location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom

Name: Jewel of the Black Sun
Description: Increases Ranged damage by 6% for 15 seconds after a ranged kill stacks up to 3 times.
Location: Can be purchased from Wud for 400 Scrap

Name: Keeper's Ring
Description: Increases resistance to all elemental damage by 20.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Yaesha

Name: Leech Ember
Description: Melee hits steal health from enemies.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom

Name: Mother's Ring
Description: Reduces incoming Ranged Damage by 20%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Pillar of Stone
Description: Reduces Sway by 50% and Recoil by 25%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Razorstone
Description: Melee Charge Melee Attacks (100% Chance) will apply a BLEEDING effect, dealing 100% of the damage dealt over 15 seconds.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Corsus

Name: Ring of Evasion
Description: Moderately increases evade window and increase evade speed by 10%.
Location: Found as a random drop on Earth

Name: Root Circlet
Description: Increases Melee Attack Speed by 15%.
Location: Given by Root Worshiper found on Earth - Marrow Pass so long as he is not made hostile by the players.

Name: Sagestone
Description: Increases earned Experience by 30%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Stone Of Balance
Description: Increases Ranged and Melee damage by 15%.
Location: Found as a random spawn on Yaesha

Name: Heart of the Wolf
Description: Increases Stamina by 25 and Movement speed by 10%.
Location: Found at the Pan Flautist upon completion of the bell puzzle on Yaesha. May spawn in other locations.

Name: Guardian's Ring
Description: Reduce incoming melee damage by 20%.
Location:
Bought from the Stuck Merchant

Can also be found at Scalding Glade

Name: Ring of the Admiral
Description: Damage received is increased by 300%. Ranged, Melee, Mods and Minions damage dealt is increased by 15%.
Location: Bought from Reggie in Ward 13 for only 2 Scrap.

Name: Akari War Band
Description: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks increases Crit Chance by 15% and Crit damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
Location: Defeat either The Harrow or Claviger on Hardcore Mode.

Name: Empowering Loop
Description: Increases Ranged damage by 25%, but decrease Fire rate by 15%
Location: Defeat Ixillis on Hardcore Mode.

Name: Band of Accord
Description: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% and is shared with other players.
Location: High Five Emote another player

Name: Ring of Supremacy
Description: Increases all damage dealt by 20% after the wearer's health has been full for at least 5 seconds.
Location: Hardcore Mode: Drop from Totem Father or The Ravager.

Name: Provisioner Ring
Description: Firearms reload overtime while stowed.
Location: Hardcore Mode: Drop from Singe or The Ent.

Name: Grim Coil
Description: Realoading a weapon after dealing 60% of the base damage from a single magazine increases its damage by 4% for 15 Seconds. Stacks 5 times.
Location: Can be puarchased from Iskal Renegade at Corsus

Name: Soul Ember
Description: Summon Health is reduced by 60%. On death they'll explode dealing 150 plus weapon level damage within 3 meters. Summons that explode normally will deal 25% bonus damage.
Location: Can be obtained at Corsus. Destroy all the hanging pods in the Circlet Hatchery to obtain the ring.

Name: Deceiver's Band
Description: Increases Evade Speed by 25% and Movement Speed by 15% for 10 seconds after performing a slide.
Location: Can be found as a random drop on Rhom.

Name: Ring of the Unclean
Description: Unarmed Melee attacks deal 2x damage
Location: Can be acquired by helping the Elf Queen infect the Iskal Renegade.

Name: Compulsion Loop
Description: Increase Movement Speed by 20%, Fire Rate by 15%, and Melee Speed by 10% for 5 seconds after slaying an enemy.
Location: Can be found as a random drop on Rhom.

Name: Loop of Prosperity
Description: Metal materials acquired on pickup are doubled
Location: Obtained after defeating a total of 50 Bosses in Survival Mode (Can be done in many runs)

Name: Gift of the Iskal
Description: Mod power is generated slowly over time, but reduces the wearer's Healing Effectiveness by 25%
Location: Defeat Mar'Gosh

Name: Hero's Ring
Description: Increases Movement Speed by 25% while sprinting towards a wounded teammate. Revive Speed is increased by 100% and the wearer cannot by staggered while reviving
Location: Can be found at the Fetid Pool dungeon in Corsus. Use the Acid Cleaned Key to head to the second floor and open the second door using another Acid Cleaned Key.

Name: Iskal Hunter Band
Description: Reduces Spread by 35%
Location: Can be acquired in the Hall Of Whispers Dungeon in Corsus by killing the red beetle.

Name: Gunslinger's Ring
Description: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 50% and Fire Rate by 5%
Location: Can be found on Earth

Name: Soul Link
Description: Summons will steal 5% of the damage dealt and return it to the wearer as health
Location: Can be found in a cave that spawns next to a Cryptolith on Rhom.

Name: Ring of the Mantis
Description: Increases Fire Rate by 10% and Crit damage by 20% when the wearer stops moving for at least 1.5 seconds
Location: Can be acquired by locating and killing a red beetle in Strange Pass on Corsus.

Name: Ring of Elusion
Description: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks refunds 50 Stamina and reduces Stamina Cost by 100% for 5 seconds.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Rhom

Name: Band of Castor
Description: Increase Melee Speed by 10%, but reduces Fire Rate by 15%. While wearing BAND OF POLLUX, Encumbrance is reduced by 15 and Evade Speed is increased by 15%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Band of Pollux
Description: Increase Melee Damage by 15%, but reduces Range Damage by 20%. While wearing BAND OF CASTOR, Encumbrance is reduced by 15 and Evade Speed is increased by 15%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Aggressor's Bane
Description: Reduces incoming damage by 15%, but also increases enemy aggression towards the wearer, and increases enemy Awareness Range by 200%.
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Stockpile Circlet
Description: Increases Max Ammo reserves for all firearms by 50%
Location: Can be found at a random location at Earth

Name: Pearl of Luminescence
Description: Wearer has a 70% chance to double the amount of Lumenite Crystal acquired on pickup when killing Elite enemies
Location: Can be found on Yaesha

Name: Ring of Shadows
Description: Enemy alert range reduced by 40%
Location: Can be found on Yasesha

Name: Burden of the Reckless
Description: Disables healing from Dragon hearts. Perfect dodgin enemy attacks will regenerate 5% of the wearer's Max Health per second over 5 seconds.
Location: Found as random drop on Rhom

Name: Spirit Stone
Description: Increases Mod Power generation by 25% and Weapon Mod damage by 10%.
Location: Found at a random location on Yaesha.

Name: Restriction Cord
Description: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces incoming damage by 15%.
Location: Found at a random location on Yaesha.

Name: Burden of the Follower
Description: Reduces Fire Rate by 25%. Increases Mod Power generation by 100%.
Location: Found at a random location on Yaesha.

Name: Burden of the Devoted
Description: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 15%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.
Location: Found at a random location on Corsus

Name: Ring of the Punisher
Description: Increases all dmg dealt by 5% towards enemies for every STATUS effect applied to them.
Location: Defeat Brudvaak, the Rider and Vargr, the Warg

Name: Black Cat Band
Description: When taking fatal dmg, wearer's Health will drop to 1 instead of dying. 1 minute cooldown.
Location: Defeat every dungeon boss twice.

Name: Bright Steel Ring
Description: Gives wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of their Armor Encumbrance.
Location: Defeat every world boss twice.

Name: Ring of Flawless Beauty
Description: Ranged Weakspot dmg increased by 40%. Ranged dmg is reduced 20% when failing to shoot a weakspot.
Location: Purchase 100 items.

Name: Scavenger's Ring
Description: Collecting Scrap, Iron, and Ammo pickups regenerates 3% of Max Health
Location: Bought from Krall Mother for 400 Scrap.

Name: Band of Discord
Description: Reduces Consumable Use Speed by 15%. Dragon Hearts heal wearer and all teammates wearing this ring with 125 Health over 20s
Location: Bought from Sebum for 400 Scrap.

Name: Band of Synergy
Description: Increase Teamwork effect by 10% and Revival speed by 11% per ally also wearing this ring
Location: Bought from Sebum for 400 Scrap.

Name: Amber Moonstone
Description: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, all STATUS effects will be removed, and incoming dmg reduced by 15% for 20s
Location: Give Clementine the Janitor's Watch.

Name: Swashbuckler's Signet
Description: Every 20s gain buff, stacks up to 3. Melee Charge Attacks consume 1 stack and replenish 15% of the wearer's ammo capacity for both firearms.
Location: Kill only the Emin with the false eye during the Creeper's Peepers event.

Name: Prismatic Diamond Ring
Description: Increases all ELEMENTAL dmg by 10%
Location: Complete the Grave Siege event.

Name: Evoker's Seal
Description: Refunds 10% Mod Power on use.
Location: Destroy all Warning Totems, without alerting any.

Name: Juggernaut Band
Description: After sprinting 2s, incoming dmg reduced by 10%. Movement Speed increased by 10%, stagger level is reduced by 1, and the wearer will perform the heaviest evade.
Location: Destroy all Warning Totems, alerting some but not all.

Name: Bloodletter's Insignia
Description: BLEEDING effects applied by the wearer steal 10% damage dealt and return it to the wearer as Health.
Location: Found at the end of the Warning Totems dungeon.

Name: Serpent's Fang
Description: Increased Charged Melee Damage by 20%.
Location: Found randomly in Reisum.

Name: Volatile Gem
Description: Dragon Hearts explode dealing 320 dmg plus 10% per gear score and inflict an additional 100% stagger dmg within 5m
Location: Found randomly in Reisum.

Name: Burden of the Warlord
Description: Reduces effective range of all firearms by 50% and increases all dmg dealt by 15%.
Location: Found randomly in Reisum.

Name: Ring of Honor
Description: Increases Health by 10, Stamina by 10, and reduces Armor Encumbrance by 10
Location: Found behind a locked door.

Name: Alchemist's Jewel
Description: Increase Armor Effectivness by 50% and Armor Encumbrance by 25
Location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.

Name: Backbreaker Ring
Description: Increase Melee Backstab dmg by 30%
Location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.

Name: Burden of the Gambler
Description: Disables Weakspot damage bonus. Increases Crit Chance by 15% and Crit Damage by 25%.
Location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.

Name: Five Fingered Ring
Description: Increases Unarmed Melee dmg by 50%, Crit Chance by 50%, and Crit dmg by 25%
Location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.

Name: Vanguard Ring
Description: Melee Charge attacks reduce incoming and outgoing dmg by 4% and increase enemy aggression towards wearer for 15s. Stacks 5 times.
Location: Found at a random location on Rural Earth.
